ygData.msgSnippet: I have killed Meldrath neigh unto 100 times.  Include about 15 since the last patch. All you get is a bronze weapon and maybe some cloth armor.  There is
ygData.messageBody:
I have killed Meldrath neigh unto 100 times. Include about 15 since the last patch.
All you get is a bronze weapon and maybe some cloth armor. There is nothing
anywhere inside the dungeon either, as I have look all around.

jbuckingham@... wrote:

> Not gonna spoil it for ye all though, ye gotta kill Meldrath for the recipes.
>
>
> "
>
> Also, of a side note, Meldrath will be holding one of the components for the new
> ranger only armor thats coming in with the next patch :)
> So, if he does indeed carry tinkering recipes, it should soon become apparent,
> as all those rangers go gunning for him :)

--Eron
aeron@...

from The Simpsons:

Homer: Animals are crapping in our houses, and we're picking it up. Did we lose a
war?? That's not America. That's not even Mexico.
